derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent.: from late Latin granulum, diminutive of Latin granum 'grain'

entry.def: Granules are small round pieces of something.

example.ex: She was spooning coffee granules into cups.
example.tran: 她在用勺往杯子里舀咖啡颗粒。
